name: Trainer.io
description:
Trainer.io lets you practice your combat skills with tons of weapons, attachments and actions against AI opponents and targets, sharp your skills offline, control your recoil and head-shot skills and win at any distance like a professional gamer.

- Building system
-Battle Royale game mode
- Multiplayer mode
- Single Player mode
- 8 types of weapons
- Georgeus graphics
- Advanced AI system



Offline! -- Play Any Where Any Time!
Online! -- Play with your friend on the servers!



Train yourself on six diffrent modes: Player vs AI, Battle Royale, RocketRide, Infinity Battle

, Building, Multiplayer

Fight againts up to 40 enemies at the same time.
